fields.label: Hero video
fields.name: hero_video
fields.instructions: If no video is selected, a hero image will be used instead. Select the featured image on the right hand side.

fields.label: Additional links
fields.name: additional_links
fields.instructions: Choose which set of additional links you would like.

fields.label: Tagline
fields.name: tagline
fields.default_value: We’re actively rethinking what a photography gallery can be. We produce exhibitions, long-term collaborative projects, publications, festivals, and university courses — onsite at our gallery in Liverpool and beyond.

fields.label: Address
fields.name: address
fields.default_value:
Open Eye Gallery,
19 Mann Island,
Liverpool, L3 1BP

fields.label: Gallery Closed
fields.name: closed
fields.instructions: Select this option if the gallery is closed. You will need to switch this option off again when the gallery is back open.

fields.label: Page builder
fields.name: page_builder
fields.instructions: Click add row to add another page section

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Add the video embed code here
